Message:
Dendrification is a curse...
brought about by a goddess—

The first one to propose that
idea was my grandmother.

Within the forest we call
our home lives a goddess...

...and she is the reason
our forest is so
abundant with life.

In the past, many people
from our village were
able to see the goddess,
but they slowly lost that
ability through the generations.

Now, only the Penthesileas,
who carry royal blood,
are able to see her.

If that were true,
then the only ones now
who could find the goddess
and bring her back to her
senses were my mother or me.

Without hesitating,
my mother stepped forward,
saying, “I will carry out
my duty as Queen.”

Upon hearing those words,
everyone’s faces softened
with relief.

Everyone except me...
and my grandmother,
who had the ability to
see into the future...
